Description:
EXCLUSIVE SHEARWATER ESTATE- JUST MOVE IN
Near new home featuring stunning decked area, crescent drive with parking for everyone, two separate bedroom and living areas, bright sunny kitchen with stone benches,3 /4 bedrooms, exclusive Shearwater Estate - read on!
This beautiful and established near new 6 star energy rated home is located in the exclusive Shearwater Estate in Cowes. An easy stroll to the Golf Course and the north facing Silverleaves beach, is also a short walk to central Cowes.
Inviting undercover alfresco and open deck area off the lounge room through double sliding glass doors. Perfect for bbq and entertaining, or sit on the deck in the sun overlooking the rear established treed garden.
Room for cars, boats, caravans etc, with dual access and a semi circular drive to a double garage with remote controlled door, plus roller door access to the rear garden. Additional third toilet located in the garage.
The home also features three large bedrooms with a fourth bedroom/study or lounge room. Bright sunny chefs kitchen, stainless steel Smeg 900mm stove and range hood, expansive stone waterfall bench, butlers pantry, the list goes on !
The main bedroom is privately located towards the front, has a large walk through robe and spacious ensuite.
The living area with its double sliding doors and large windows welcomes the natural light and is enhanced with the adjoining open living room with north facing double sliding doors overlooking an outdoor private rockery.
LED down lights throughout, reverse cycle air conditioner, built in robes, fruit trees, established gardens.
An inspection will surely impress.
Insights: 5 SHOALHAVEN ROAD, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Doesn't Get Any Better Than This…Just like New!
Special Features: - Huge Double Garage + Separate 60m2 Shed with amenities
This near new home has it all!! Set on a large corner allotment, this magnificent property offers two large living areas vaulted ceilings, separate dining area, four bedrooms/ two bathrooms and just a short stroll to Anderson Rd Beach/Boat ramp.
Features include:
: Corner Allotment – 2 driveways – remote roller doors & gates
: Wood Heater
: 2 Split Systems
: Solar panels
: Stacker doors to the outside entertainment area
: Stone Benches – double dishwasher – 900mm oven cook top
: Full Northerly aspects
: Tank Water
: TV Points in all rooms
: NBN
: Fully landscaped gardens
This child and pet friendly property offers a double garage and a 60m2 shed/ workshop plus a carport with room for a boat and or caravan and loads of extra off street parking...
If you have been looking for a very special home on Phillip Island this definitely has to be one to inspect, the current owners are very house-proud and you will be greeted with a very special property.
Insights: 21 BOOBOOK GROVE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

WHY PAY RENT?
Located in the highly sought after Seagrove Estate this block is perfect for the first home buyer or those looking for an investment.
In a picturesque part of this estate opposite the lake and overlooking parkland this the ideal location to build the home you have been dreaming of. This land comes with building plans.
The Seagrove estate is conveniently located only 700m to a beautiful safe swimming beach and only 800m to Cowes main street of shops, restaurants & cafes.

Address: Villa 191/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
Description:
AFFORDABLE LIFESTYLE OPPORTUNITY
An affordable investment opportunity, within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island. An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne. It consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), and a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen.
This investment opportunity within the Resort will appeal to corporate couples, singles or families looking for a luxurious, relaxing, maintenance free getaway.
The resort offers a cafe/bar, indoor gym, games room and walking trails full of wildlife. Come and take a look and you will not be disappointed.
All of this is within a 2 minute drive to Cowes CBD, beautiful bay beaches and famous surf beaches.

Description:
'Kent Haven' - A Unique Land Release in Natural Surrounds
Kent Haven Estate is a truly remarkable subdivision located in the heart of Cowes.
Set in a picturesque environment adjacent to a natural spring fed lake, Kent Haven offers a tranquil and serene destination for those looking for a quiet lifestyle surrounded by parklands with established trees. This boutique and exclusive estate has only 9 home sites with spacious proportions. Design covenants uphold the integrity of the subdivision to ensure the presentation of the street scape blends seamlessly with the tranquil surrounds.
Known to be the last remaining opportunity for development in central Cowes, Kent Haven Estate offers natural surrounds only a short distance from the golden sands of Phillip Island's northern Bay beaches and bustling cosmopolitan Cafe and Restaurant strip.
This is the last remaining block.

Description:
4 BEDROOMS & CLOSE TO TOWN
Located on an allotment approximately 584m2 you will find this spacious 4 bedroom 1 bathroom home. Only a short walk to the Cowes RSL and main street where you can find fantastic restaurants and cafes.
This home offers large living/kitchen and dining spaces with timber floors through the home giving a warming cosy feeling.
All 4 bedrooms are complete with built in robes, large full family bathroom and large windows bring in lots of natural light.
At the rear of the property you will find the fantastic paved entertainment area perfect for BBQ and watch the kids in the back yard.
Be quick to book your inspection to see what this home has to offer

FABULOUS TREED SETTING.

Three good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom and separate laundry.
Close proximity to the Anderson Street boat ramp, the beach and the Cowes shopping and cafe precinct.

Description:
Secluded Setting in a Great Location.
Situated within walking distance to the pristine Cowes north-facing beach, this luxurious single level residence presents the perfect lock & leave option if you would prefer enjoying your weekends.
This family home has been perfectly designed and features four spacious bedrooms, master with walk-in-robe and ensuite. Large light filled open plan living / dining / kitchen area with sliding doors that allow the inside & outside living spaces to blend seamlessly into one. The spacious undercover deck area is a great entertaining space for family and friends. The home also includes a double garage with rear roller door and side access gates for caravan/boat storage. Other features include split system heating/cooling, ceiling fans and polished hardwood floors.
This lovely residence is ideal for permanent or holiday living. Call now to inspect, you won't be disappointed.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
NEW LAND RELEASE – STAGE 8
BUY NOW AND SETTLE WHEN TITLED…
Newly released building allotment of approx. 448m2. This is a level allotment in the NEW SHEARWATER ESTATE, which promises to be a great place to live with spectacular wetlands area, boardwalks and walking tracks. The estate is centrally located to the Phillip Island golf course, with the front nine at your doorstep and the back nine running along the length of the estate. Silverleaves Beach is only a short walk away, with the Heath lands of Rhyll and walking track just a short distance in the opposite direction. This is an exciting new estate with plenty to offer the families and holiday residents.

Description:
SHEARWATER ON THE ISLAND – A GREAT PLACE TO CALL HOME
Titled corner allotment ready to build on this sensational 30 hectare subdivision is located on Settlement Road, abutting the prestigious Silverleaves district and adjoining the Cowes Golf Club. Over 13.5 acres of the site is earmarked for public open space incorporating a wetlands system.
Many buyers have purchased with a view to call the Shearwater Estate home.
: Opposite the Cowes Golf Course
: Walking Distance to the Silverleaves Beach and General Store
: Beautiful parks, Easy access to the walking/bikes tracks.
: Award Winning Design
: Level allotments easy to build on
: More affordable than you think

Delightfully Designed
This recently built residence is conveniently located to all of Cowes' desired amenities. Take a short stroll to the pristine north facing Cowes Beach. This well fitted out home includes spacious open plan lounge, dining and kitchen with all the creature comforts. There are three bedrooms, all with built in robes the master has walk through bathroom giving the home a good flow. Internal access to single lock up garage adds to the easy living style the home has to offer, NBN also ready too. Low maintenance garden is ideal with side access to the yard with room for the Boat or Caravan. Good tenant currently in place.

New land release - Close to shops and beach
The Whimbrel release is just 800m from the town centre and even closer to the beach.
All home sites in the Whimbrel release feature an underground gas (LPG) network, recycled water and are part of the National Broadband Network.
Titles are anticipated late 2017.
This property situated in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.

Description:
LOOKING FOR THE PERFECT BEACH HOUSE?
This neat property is ideally located a short distance to Cowes beautiful beaches, boat ramp and local shops & restaurants.
The property features 3 spacious bedrooms & central bathroom. The bright & sunny open plan living/dining/kitchen (complete with split system air conditioning) opens out to an undercover full length veranda.
The property offers plenty of storage space with single carport, additional under house storage and garage. A rear deck overlooks the large backyard and is perfect for summer entertaining or relaxing.
This is a value packed property that is ready for you to move in and enjoy.
Insights: 360 Settlement Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
A Super Investment
Centrally located in Cowes, within easy walking distance of the shopping centre, this property comprises two separate dwellings on a 673 sm approx allotment with subdivision potential (STCA).
One is a contemporary styled two storey residence including three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two living areas, modern kitchen, single garage and own fenced yard. It features a home theatre, polished timber floor in upstairs living area, air conditioning and solar power.
The other is a single level residence comprising three bedrooms, open plan kitchen/dining/living area, bathroom and laundry. This property also has a single garage, solar power and fenced yard.
Call today and arrange an inspection.

Description:
New land release Seagrove Estate. Corner Block. Be quick!
Live closer to everything. The new Curlew release is only a short walk to the centre of town. Seagrove is just 800 metres from the main street of Cowes, and even closer to the beach.
This 622 square metre corner block is located only a short stroll to Seagrove Park which features a playground and undercover BBQ area.
This release features an underground gas (LPG) network, recycled water, and super fast optic fibre connections to the National Broadband Network.
Titles are expected early to mid 2018.
Call our sales team now to secure your slice of Phillip Island.

Description:
CENTRAL COWES LIFESTYLE PROPERTY WITH A POOL
A great opportunity to secure this well maintained brick home in the Cowes central where you can walk to everything including the north facing beach of Cowes. This property has successfully operative as a very lucrative holiday rental over the last six years and is five star reviewed. Take advantage of growing tourist numbers to Phillip Island and live the lifestyle you have always dreamed of. This property is located on a corner allotment of approx. 800m2, in a quiet yet high exposure position in central Cowes close to both the beach, supermarkets, shops & restaurants and only a short drive to the world renowned Penguin Parade & Phillip Island Grand Prix Circuit.
Offering three bedrooms that can comfortably accommodate seven guests and bathroom with separate shower & bath. The large and comfortable lounge has reverse cycle heating/cooling and separate dining plus kitchen with dishwasher and polished floorboards throughout.
Outdoor features include an 8m x 4m in ground swimming pool, entertaining area, established garden complete with fruit trees, high fencing for privacy, lock up garage plus small storage shed, as well as off street parking.
This wonderful property offers endless possibilities; perfect for the savvy investor, ongoing holiday rental, for your family holiday home or permanently living. Inspection by appointment only.
Asking $539,000
Insights: 37 CHURCH STREET, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.
